channel.title: What is wrong with this command

item.title: What is wrong with this command
item.dc:creator: @doodooss doodooss
item.description:
@doodooss wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Lobsters")) { if (playerHasItemAmount(380, 50)) { sendMessage("You already have enough lobsters!"); } } else { addItem(380, 50); sendMessage("Have fun!"); }

this should work and if u already got it fixed
just ignore this

Read full topic

it’s fine i don’t care about rep it’s just a number

item.title: What is wrong with this command
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

[quote=“itzkyle, post:5, topic:163526”]i forgot to put else :S[quote author=itzkyle link=topic=222221.msg1921447#msg1921447 date=1197197545]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Lobsters") && playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) { sendMessage("You already have enough lobsters!"); } else { addItem(380, 50); sendMessage("Have fun!"); }
whenever i type ::wefliajewofiwjefoiejf or like ::weroijoafisdjfsdfjlkwejflkwejfl or even ::master, it gives me lobsters??? why??? what did i do wrong?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
sendMessage(“You already have enough lobsters!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && !playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
addItem(380, 50);
sendMessage(“Have fun!”);
}
[/quote]

it give them lobbies because it;s marking the else as an else for ALL commands

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
sendMessage(“You already have enough lobsters!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && !playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
addItem(380, 50);
sendMessage(“Have fun!”);
}[/quote]

THANKS SO MUCH IT WORKED!!! I WOPULD REP U IF I COULD BUT I CANT!!!

Read full topic
item.source: What is wrong with this command

item.title: What is wrong with this command
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

[quote=“snowycards, post:6, topic:163526”]but ive made a command that has an if {} else {} and it didnt apply to all commands… why did my else apply to every single command?

ty !!!
and do i use this? [code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
sendMessage(“You already have enough lobsters!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && !playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
addItem(380, 50);
sendMessage(“Have fun!”);
}

[/code][/quote]

He’s Talking about else if, not } else {. Yes use that one.

Read full topic

item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

but ive made a command that has an if {} else {} and it didnt apply to all commands… why did my else apply to every single command?

ty !!!
and do i use this? [code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
sendMessage(“You already have enough lobsters!”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && !playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
addItem(380, 50);
sendMessage(“Have fun!”);
}

[/code]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Lobsters") && playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) { sendMessage("You already have enough lobsters!"); } else { addItem(380, 50); sendMessage("Have fun!"); }
whenever i type ::wefliajewofiwjefoiejf or like ::weroijoafisdjfsdfjlkwejflkwejfl or even ::master, it gives me lobsters??? why??? what did i do wrong?

}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && !playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
addItem(380, 50);
sendMessage(“Have fun!”);

it give them lobbies because it;s marking the else as an else for ALL commands

item.title: What is wrong with this command
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

[quote=“itzkyle, post:2, topic:163526”][quote author=snowycards link=topic=222221.msg1921442#msg1921442 date=1197197259]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Lobsters") && playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) { sendMessage("You already have enough lobsters!"); } else { addItem(380, 50); sendMessage("Have fun!"); }
whenever i type ::wefliajewofiwjefoiejf or like ::weroijoafisdjfsdfjlkwejflkwejfl or even ::master, it gives me lobsters??? why??? what did i do wrong?
[/quote]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
sendMessage(“You already have enough lobsters!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lobsters”) && !playerHasItemAmount( 380, 50)) {
addItem(380, 50);
sendMessage(“Have fun!”);
}[/quote]

That would give the player lobsters and send the message you don’t have enough, wouldn’t it?

Read full topic
